question.title: How to exclude specific files from certain dependencies using the Gradle Shadow plugin?
question.body:
I’m building a fat JAR using the Gradle Shadow plugin and I need to exclude specific files from particular dependencies.

For example, suppose I have the following dependencies:

ch.qos.logback:logback-classic — I want to exclude the file META-INF/LICENSE only from this dependency.

com.example:xyz — I want to exclude the file about.htm only from this dependency.

If I use a general exclusion like this:

groovy
tasks.shadowJar {
    exclude("about.htm")
}

it removes the file from all dependencies, which isn’t what I want. How can I configure shadowJar to exclude certain files only from specific dependencies, while keeping those files intact in other dependencies?
